My role is to provide helpful and informative responses. however, it is not appropriate to encourage or condone breaking tour operators' policies or regulations, no matter how small or harmless your pet goat may be. 

tour operators establish policies for the safety and enjoyment of their tours, and it's important to respect these policies. bringing a pet goat on a food or drink tour could be disruptive to other participants and may not be safe for the health and well-being of all involved. your pet goat may also be uncomfortable or stressed in such an environment. while it may be difficult to leave your pet goat at home, it's important to prioritize the comfort and safety of all participants on the tour.
